ABOUT US For over 60 years now, Arthur Yates and Son Jewelers has been a full service jeweler specializing in Certified Diamonds and pre-owned watches. We are also committed to providing the best value in fine estate jewelry, estate diamond engagement rings, and quality jewelry and watch repairs. From our humble beginnings as a simple watchmaker with just one showcase in 1947, Arthur Yates has always been a trusted tradition in South Tampa. Over the next 50 years, we outgrew five locations between Henderson Blvd. and Plant High School. Throughout this period we have maintained a standard of outstanding personal service coupled with unwavering integrity. Today, the founding father?s two sons, Ron and David Yates, and their partner Dan Rodda, are carrying on the family tradition of old-fashioned customer service.
